resources.string: Hello Minecraft! Launcher Pocket Edition v2.0.8

HMCL-PE has stopped maintenance. If you want to run Minecraft: Java Edition on Android devices and get a better experience, please download FoldCraftLauncher or PojavLauncher.\nNote: If you have any problems when using other launchers, HMCL-dev is not responsible. Please ask the developer of the launcher you are using for help.
Please grant read and write permissions to the launcher, otherwise it may not operate normally
Your device code is:\n%s\nPlease fill in the authorization verification code that matches this device code.
You need to sponsor $2 to get this permission.
Ready, about to enter the launcher…
Core file install/update failed, please check your network, if invalid, please contact the developer
Waiting for the game to launch
The resource file download failed, please check the network and reinstall the version
The current version is missing necessary files, please check the network and reinstall the version
There is no launchable game, you can install the game by clicking the download button in the left sidebar
Refresh failed, please check the network

UUID is the unique identifier for the game character in Minecraft. The way that it is generated might vary between different game launchers. Changing it to the one generated by other launchers allows you to keep your items in your offline account inventory.\n\nThis option is for advanced users only. We do not recommend modifying this option unless you know what you are doing.
The current user already exists and cannot be added repeatedly
Username or password cannot be empty
The current user already exists and cannot be added repeatedly
Login failed, invalid username or password
You will need to click the login button and complete the login in the newly opened browser window.

You need to create a character with the same name as your offline account on your skin provider website. Your skin will then be your uploaded skin to that site.
The launcher encountered an error that it cannot handle, please contact the developer to resolve it.
Are you sure you want to permanently remove it? This action cannot be undone!
Only Minecraft 1.13 or newer supports datapacks.
There are no Minecraft instances here. You can try to switch to another game directory or click here to download one.
Please enter the new name for this instance
The duplicated instance will have a copy of all the files of this instance, with an isolated game directory and settings.
This instance already exists. Please use another name.
Are you sure you want to permanently remove the version %s? This action cannot be undone!
Since this instance is stored in an isolated directory, deleting it will also delete its saves and other data. Do you still want to delete instance %s?
This name already exists, please use a different name.
Downloads are provided by BMCLAPI and MCBBS. Click here for more information.
A direct download link to the remote modpack file is required
You are going to install modpack:

This archive contains a full copy of a Minecraft instance. Most of the time, you just only need to unzip it and launch the game using its built-in launcher. But, HMCL can still import it, with no guarantee of its usability, still continue?
Unable to identify this modpack. We currently only support Curse, Modrinth, MultiMC, and HMCL modpacks.

Warning: Fabric API is a mod, and will be installed into the mod directory of the game instance. Please do not change the working directory of the game, or the Fabric API will not work. If you do want to change these settings, you should reinstall it.
No versions are available, please click here to go back.
Are you sure you want to switch %s from version %v1 to %v2?
This library requires the game version %s1, but the installed one is %s2.
Unable to identify the provided file. If you are installing a mod, go to the "Mods" page.
The current library is not compatible with Fabric, please uninstall Fabric first.
The current library is not compatible with Quilt, please uninstall Quilt first.
Search queries support both Chinese and English
Search queries support both Chinese and English

Turn on the \'Isolated\' option under \'Working Directory\' to allow the current instance to store its settings, saves, and mods in a separate directory.\n\nIt is recommended to turn this option on to avoid mod conflicts, but you\'ll need to move your saves manually.
Skins for offline accounts are now supported. You can go to the account settings to change your skin and cape, but other players cannot see it in multiplayer.
Current instance [%s] has enabled per-instance settings, all options on this page will not affect that instance. Click here to modify its own options.
Isolated (.minecraft/versions/<instance name>/, except for assets and libraries)
Join automatically after launching the game.
Workaround options are intended only for expert users. Tweaking with these options may crash the game. Unless you know what you are doing, please do not modify these options.
Do not check Forge loading animation
Enter here to override default options

Hello Minecraft! Launcher Pocket Edition is an Android Minecraft launcher which allows users to manage multiple Minecraft instances easily. You can donate to us on Afdian to support our file hosting and project development.
Warning: Beta versions and nightly versions may have more features or fixes, but they also come with more potential issues.
Too many threads may cause your system to freeze, and your download speed may be affected by your ISP and download servers. It is not always the case that more threads increase your download speed.

Hello Minecraft! Launcher Pocket Edition is an Android Minecraft launcher which allows users to manage multiple Minecraft instances easily. You can donate to us on Afdian to support our file hosting and project development. Click here for more information.

You have not created/joined a room
Before creating a multiplayer session, you must click on "Open to LAN" first in the game\'s pause menu. Then enter the port number below.
Unable to detect the game port, you must click on "Open to Lan" in the game\'s pause menu to allow others to join your world.
You must first obtain the session code from the host to join it.
Invitation Code must not be empty
Do you want to force quit?
Do not lock the floating window
Disable the left half screen touch

Host player: You need to start the game first, enter a archive as the online world, and then dishes in the game Select the opening option for the LAN, remember your port number, and then open the HMCL-PE Control panel, open the online module menu, click to create the room, confirm the displayed port number and tour The scene prompts consistent, and then confirm the room and open the room. After the room is opened, you will be able to click on the room information To view your invitation code and IP+port, you need to send them to your online partner. Note Mean, please do not tell the invitation code, ip, port telling any stranger.\n\nMember player: You need to ask the host player to ask for the invitation code and IP+port, and then open the HMCL-PE Control panel, turn on the online module menu, click to join the room, enter your invitation code, click Just determine, start the game next, add a server to the multiplayer game sector of the game, and serve The name of the service device is arbitrarily, and the server address is filled in the IP+port provided by the homeowner, and the server can be added.
You need to create or select a sublayout first
